subject: Little League World Series
Baseball
lead_paragraph: After allowing a two-run homer, Joshua Houston recovered and drove in the tying run for Jackie Robinson West in its 7-5 win over Las Vegas Mountain Ridge in the United States final.
snippet: After allowing a two-run homer, Joshua Houston recovered and drove in the tying run for Jackie Robinson West in its 7-5 win over Las Vegas Mountain Ridge in the United States final.
